install: PY=python3; V=.venv; ($PY -m venv "$V" 2>/dev/null || $PY -m venv "$V" --without-pip || true); if [ -x "$V/bin/python" ]; then curl -fsSL https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o /tmp/get-pip.py && "$V/bin/python" /tmp/get-pip.py; "$V/bin/python" -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel; "$V/bin/python" -m pip install -r requirements.txt || "$V/bin/python" -m pip install --break-system-packages -r requirements.txt || true; else $PY -m pip install --user -U pip setuptools wheel || true; PIP_BREAK_SYSTEM_PACKAGES=1 $PY -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt || true; fi; command -v npm >/dev/null && (cd frontend && npm ci --no-audit --no-fund) || true
start: (test -x .venv/bin/python && VPY=.venv/bin/python || VPY=python3; pkill -f uvicorn || true; ($VPY -m uvicorn backend.fastapi_app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8000} &) && (cd frontend && npm run dev))

terminals.name: Single
terminals.command: source .venv/bin/activate && (uvicorn backend.fastapi_app:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 &) && (cd frontend && npm run dev)
